notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: R.T.B. conceived of the project, analyzed all data, and wrote the paper. C.C. calculated velocity metrics, discounted exposure metrics, and co-wrote the paper. S.M., J.M., J.W.W., and M.A.W. helped frame questions and co-wrote the paper. G.H.A. co-conceived of the project, helped with analysis, and co-wrote the paper.
